author: fabio.martelli@gmail.com
msg: Into ConnInstanceLoader I modified properties overriding to correct a little bug about skipping existing properties.
I made some modification into the console: overridden property is required if property schema is required.
Further, bean registration is required just for resources. Schema names retrieving is performed just instantiating a ConnectorFacadeProxy ad-hoc.
